body:
AdRoll follows industry standard customer data security practices, including:

  • Our infrastructure is hosted entirely within the Amazon Cloud which has completed SAS70 Type II audits.
  • Amazon provides physical security and, along with Amazon, we provide network security against DDoS (Distributed Denial of Service) attacks, man-in-the-middle attacks, IP spoofing, port scanning, and packet sniffing, among others.
  • AdRoll.com is served 100% over https.
  • We use identity and access management, so that only developers have access.
  • We practice key rotation and password policies as part of an employee lifecycle program.
  • To prevent malware in advertising we employ services such as Google Safe-browsing.

Last updated December 10, 2014
name: Data Security, the AdRoll Way
title: Data Security, the AdRoll Way
